title: Look At the Table
text: Notice that the table has $$10$$ listed for the $$x$$ value for win. This is due to the fact that if you toss a tail, you win $10. Therefore, lose must align with what happens if you toss a head.
speech: Notice that the table has  10  listed for the  x,  value for win. This is due to the fact that if you toss a tail, you win $10. Therefore, lose must align with what happens if you toss a head.

title: Determining Lose's $$x$$
text: What is the $$x$$ value for lose? Reminder that lose is associated with a negative number.
